chanceCards.content: Advance to the nearest Utility. If unowned, you may buy it from the Bank. If owned, PAY the owner.
Advance token to the nearest Stables and PAY owner the Rental to which they are entitled. If Stables are UNOWNED, you may buy it from the Bank.
TAKE A HORSE TO MARKARTH STABLES. IF YOU PASS GO, COLLECT 200
Do not pass go, do not COLLECT 200
YOUR BUILDING AND LOAN MATURES COLLECT 150
Advance token to Alinor. Take a ship to the Isles!
Make general repairs on your property. For each house: Pay 25 / For each castle: Pay 100
Advance token to the nearest Stables and PAY owner Twice the Rental to which they are otherwise entitled. If Stables are UNOWNED, you may buy it from the Bank.
You Have Been Elected CHAIRMAN OF THE BOARD. PAY EACH PLAYER 50
Advance to Sentinel. If you pass go, COLLECT 200
This card may be kept until needed, or sold
